executable.title: Clip Inferior of Center of Brain (BRAINS)
executable.description: This program will read the inputVolume as a short int image, write the BackgroundFillValue everywhere inferior to the lower bound, and write the resulting clipped short int image in the outputVolume.

image.name: inputVolume
image.label: Input Image Volume
image.description: Input image to make a clipped short int copy from.

image.name: outputVolume
image.label: Output Image Volume
image.description: Output image, a short int copy of the upper portion of the input image, filled with BackgroundFillValue.

double.name: acLowerBound
double.label: acLowerBound
double.description: When the input image to the output image, replace the image with the BackgroundFillValue everywhere below the plane This Far in physical units (millimeters) below (inferior to) the AC point (assumed to be the voxel field middle.) The oversize default was chosen to have no effect. Based on visualizing a thousand masks in the IPIG study, we recommend a limit no smaller than 80.0 mm.

string.name: backgroundFillValueString
string.description: Fill the background of image with specified short int value. Enter number or use BIGNEG for a large negative number.
string.label: Background Fill Value

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
